   "cell_type": "markdown",

   "source": [
    "# PyTorch: Tabular Classify Binary"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "948e9b30-2b97-49ab-bc88-e4ad5d1ca717",
   "metadata": {
    "tags": []
   },
   "source": [
    "*Detecting Naval Mines with Binary Classification of Sonar Data.*"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "reasonable-matrix",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "![mines](../images/banner/mines.png)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 2,
   "id": "48015a1e-f031-4cb9-a85a-aa192f426e8d",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "from aiqc import mlops, datum"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "lucky-tokyo",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "---"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "alert-cheese",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## Example Data"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "ambient-highland",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "This dataset is comprised of:\n",
    "\n",
    "* *Features* = sonar readings that have been bounced off a distant object. \n",
    "* *Label* = either a rock or metal structure (potentially a naval mine)."
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "88f0a0c1-f0bf-4caf-bd04-710414fa9e14",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "Reference [Example Datasets](example_datasets.ipynb) for more information."
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 3,
   "id": "daily-realtor",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "df = datum.to_pandas('sonar.csv')"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 4,
   "id": "monetary-probe",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/html": [
       "<div>\n",
       "<style scoped>\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type {\n",

      "text/plain": [
       "        a       b       c       d       e       f       g       h       i  \\\n",
       "0  0.0200  0.0371  0.0428  0.0207  0.0954  0.0986  0.1539  0.1601  0.3109   \n",

       "3  0.0100  0.0171  0.0623  0.0205  0.0205  0.0368  0.1098  0.1276  0.0598   \n",

       "2  0.6194  ...  0.0232  0.0166  0.0095  0.0180  0.0244  0.0316  0.0164   \n",
       "3  0.1264  ...  0.0121  0.0036  0.0150  0.0085  0.0073  0.0050  0.0044   \n",
       "4  0.4459  ...  0.0031  0.0054  0.0105  0.0110  0.0015  0.0072  0.0048   \n",
       "\n",
       "       bg      bh  object  \n",
       "0  0.0090  0.0032       R  \n",
       "1  0.0052  0.0044       R  \n",

       "4  0.0107  0.0094       R  \n",
       "\n",
       "[5 rows x 61 columns]"
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 4,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "df.head()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "286c7937-b45d-40cf-9c7d-908cdc284a1a",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "---"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "alpine-fiction",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## Pipeline"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "disciplinary-volunteer",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "Reference [High-Level API Docs](api_high_level.ipynb) for more information including how to work with non-tabular data."
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 5,
   "id": "539a0563-24da-400a-bcb8-3e6ffef96673",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "from sklearn.preprocessing import LabelBinarizer, StandardScaler"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 6,
   "id": "instructional-forum",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "\n",
      "=> Info - System overriding user input to set `sklearn_preprocess.copy=False`.\n",
      "\tThis saves memory when concatenating the output of many encoders.\n",
      "\n",
      "\n",
      "___/ featurecoder_index: 0 \\_________\n",
      "\n",
      "=> The column(s) below matched your filter(s) featurecoder filters.\n",
      "\n",
      "['a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e', 'f', 'g', 'h', 'i', 'j', 'k', 'l', 'm', 'n', 'o', 'p', 'q', 'r', 's', 't', 'u', 'v', 'w', 'x', 'y', 'z', 'aa', 'ab', 'ac', 'ad', 'ae', 'af', 'ag', 'ah', 'ai', 'aj', 'ak', 'al', 'am', 'an', 'ao', 'ap', 'aq', 'ar', 'as', 'at', 'au', 'av', 'aw', 'ax', 'ay', 'az', 'ba', 'bb', 'bc', 'bd', 'be', 'bf', 'bg', 'bh']\n",
      "\n",
      "=> Done. All feature column(s) have featurecoder(s) associated with them.\n",
      "No more FeatureCoders can be added to this Encoderset.\n",
      "\n"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "splitset = mlops.Pipeline.Tabular(\n",
    "    # --- Data source ---\n",
    "    df_or_path = df\n",
    "    , dtype = None\n",
    "\n",
    "    # --- Label preprocessing ---\n",
    "    , label_column = 'object'\n",
    "    , label_interpolater = None\n",
    "    , label_encoder = dict(sklearn_preprocess = LabelBinarizer(sparse_output=False))\n",
    "\n",
    "    # --- Feature preprocessing ---\n",
    "    , feature_cols_excluded = 'object'\n",
    "    , feature_interpolaters = None\n",
    "    , feature_window = None\n",
    "    , feature_encoders = dict(\n",
    "        sklearn_preprocess = StandardScaler()\n",
    "        , dtypes = ['float64']\n",
    "    )\n",
    "    , feature_reshape_indices = None\n",
    "\n",
    "    # --- Stratification ---\n",
    "    , size_test = 0.12\n",
    "    , size_validation = 0.22\n",
    "    , fold_count = None\n",
    "    , bin_count = None\n",
    ")"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "46707590-9a3f-4cbb-8447-1ffe47f7bb4d",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "---"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "4b5fb7e0-d2f9-4ca0-b937-d45242e32842",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## Modeling"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 7,
   "id": "61983707-67b9-44ed-b390-cabe8b7cfcee",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "import torch.nn as nn\n",
    "from torch import optim\n",
    "import torchmetrics as tm\n",
    "from aiqc.utils.pytorch import fit"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 8,
   "id": "7f7529f2-a0cc-4387-be3c-77d5b1f3807a",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "def fn_build(features_shape, label_shape, **hp):\n",
    "    model = nn.Sequential(\n",
    "        nn.Linear(features_shape[0], 12),\n",
    "        nn.BatchNorm1d(12,12),\n",
    "        nn.ReLU(),\n",
    "        nn.Dropout(p=0.5),\n",
    "\n",
    "        nn.Linear(12, label_shape[0]),\n",
    "        nn.Sigmoid()\n",
    "    )\n",
    "    return model"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 9,
   "id": "respective-sydney",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "def fn_train(model, loser, optimizer, samples_train, samples_evaluate, **hp):\n",
    "    return fit(\n",
    "        model, loser, optimizer, \n",
    "        samples_train, samples_evaluate,\n",
    "        epochs=hp['epoch_count'], batch_size=5,\n",
    "        metrics=[tm.Accuracy(), tm.F1Score()]\n",
    "    )"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "devoted-dance",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "Optional, will be automatically selected based on `analysis_type` if left as `None`."
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 10,
   "id": "unusual-mechanics",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "def fn_optimize(model, **hp):\n",
    "    optimizer = optim.Adamax(\n",
    "        model.parameters()\n",
    "        , lr=hp['learning_rate']\n",
    "    )\n",
    "    return optimizer"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 11,
   "id": "olympic-stadium",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "hyperparameters = dict(\n",
    "    learning_rate=[0.01, 0.005], epoch_count=[50]\n",
    ")"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 12,
   "id": "failing-treasurer",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "queue = mlops.Experiment(\n",
    "    # --- Analysis type ---\n",
    "    library = \"pytorch\"\n",
    "    , analysis_type = \"classification_binary\"\n",
    "    \n",
    "    # --- Model functions ---\n",
    "    , fn_build = fn_build\n",
    "    , fn_train = fn_train\n",
    "    , fn_optimize = fn_optimize\n",
    "    , fn_lose = None #auto\n",
    "    , fn_predict = None #auto\n",
    "    \n",
    "    # --- Training options ---\n",
    "    , repeat_count = 2\n",
    "    , hyperparameters = hyperparameters\n",
    "    , search_percent = None\n",
    "    \n",
    "    # --- Data source ---\n",
    "    , splitset_id = splitset.id\n",
    "    , foldset_id = None\n",
    "    , hide_test = False\n",
    "\n",
    ")"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 13,
   "id": "interested-intermediate",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "name": "stderr",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "ðŸ”® Training Models ðŸ”®: 100%|â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ| 4/4 [00:10<00:00,  2.62s/it]\n"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "queue.run_jobs()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "9e0d000e-20cb-48d4-a450-10a985303157",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "---"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "0996b119-6b51-44da-b1c7-1c4e6036fdb7",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## Visualization & Interpretation"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "5d274b37-2a17-4a3a-a191-60fcd3ad1408",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "For more information on visualization of performance metrics, reference the [Dashboard](dashboard.html) documentation."
   ]
  }
